text: Sweet Charity is a 1969 American romantic musical comedy-drama movie directed by first time director Bob Fosse and is based on the 1966 musical of the same name. It stars Shirley MacLaine, John McMartin, Paula Kelly, Chita Rivera, Barbara Bouchet, Sammy Davis Jr. and was distributed by Universal Pictures. It was nominated for 3 Academy Awards in 1970. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1969 romantic comedy movies Category:1969 romantic drama movies Category:1969 musical movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American musical movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies based on musicals Category:Movies directed by Bob Fosse
title: Sweet Charity (movie)
